src:
Golden Retriever Puppy Warms Up With Mum
The dog days of summer are definitely over, and this little canine is taking in the cool autumn air.

03 Nov 2019, 07:30

According to an ancient proverb, keeping a golden-haired dog in the house will bring you luck and prosperity. This golden retriever puppy seems to be enjoying the fine art of snuggling on a weekend morning.
